title: Bug
body: I was playing kayn in a normals game and i pinged I'm on my way, my game then proceeded to spam the on my way ping and also started to spam ]]]]] in chat. I then decided to leave the game and shut down my computer. i logged back on and tried to reconnect to the game i was playing but could not do it successfully. i then shut down my computer and logged back into league. i q'ed up with my friend and got into the champion select screen, but the screen with the opposing and allied champions did not come up, the screen i saw was the reconnect screen. I tried pressing reconnect but it did not allow me to reconnect and i am worried that I may not be able to play a game again. please help me!

replies.body: The first part here sounds super strange, are you using any modifications?  The champion select issue sounds like a connection problem failing to sync properly then get you into a game.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help with this, but test it in a custom game first.
